import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './cartCheckout.scss' const CartCheckout = () => { useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('storage', () => { let items = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) || [] let totalPrice = 0 total.map(item => { totalPrice += item.productPrice }) }) }) return (

Cart totals

Subtotal

{totalPrice} $

Shipping

Free Shipping

Total

{totalPrice} $

) } export default CartCheckout
